## MosaicStoreState type

Type of [MosaicStore](./lib-base.mosaicstore.md)<!-- -->'s [state](./lib-base.mosaicstore.state.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MosaicStoreState<T = unknown> = MosaicStoreBaseState & MosaicStoreDerivedState & T;
```
<b>References:</b> [MosaicStoreBaseState](./lib-base.mosaicstorebasestate.md)<!-- -->, [MosaicStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.mosaicstorederivedstate.md)

## Remarks

It combines all properties of [MosaicStoreBaseState](./lib-base.mosaicstorebasestate.md) and [MosaicStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.mosaicstorederivedstate.md) with optional extra state added by the particular `MosaicStore` implementation.

The type parameter `T` may be used to type the extra state.
